description:
The Force Protocol describes itself as a suite of distributed crypto-finance services protocols on an open-source blockchain platform, It aims to offer crypto-finance solutions to developers through its SDK toolkit and APIs for DApp development. The platform reportedly offers solutions for cross-platform asset transactions, cross-chain communication, cryptoasset-backed stablecoin issuance, token bonds issuance, on-chain payments.

name: Force Protocol
